basic.Target Organism: Fungi:Alternaria brassicola (MIC=6 µg/ml), Ascochyta pisi (MIC=6 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=2 µg/ml), Cercospora beticola (MIC=2 µg/ml), Colletotrichum lindemuthianum (MIC=1 µg/ml), Fusarium culmorum (MIC=3 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum f.sp.pisi (MIC=5 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum f.sp.lycopersici (MIC=10 µg/ml), Nectria haematococca (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Phoma betae (MIC=6 µg/ml), Pyrenophora tritici-repentis (MIC=20 µg/ml), Pyricularia oryzae (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Rhizoctonia solani (MIC=15 µg/ml), Verticillium dahliae (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Venturia inequalis (MIC=1 µg/ml).Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium (MIC=2 µg/ml), Sarcina lutea (MIC=50 µg/ml).
